data.description: Handoff system bugs found during audit: (1) No validation that task exists when handoff is created via non-CLI path (2) Handoffs not auto-closed when associated task is completed (3) No orphan detection for stale handoffs. Found: test handoff with non-existent task, orphan detection handoff still open after task completed. See D-20251224-115112-4272c7d2 for context.

properties.retrospective: Fixed by parallel sub-agents: (1) Added task validation in initiate_handoff, (2) Added auto-close when task completes, (3) Added find_orphan_handoffs to OrphanDetector. All 8 handoff tests pass.

data.title: Add handoff validation and auto-close logic
